name: Home Alone Da Mountains
description:
As the night goes on and as you chill with the fire on a cold December night, you notice someone angrily knocking at your door. With help not coming at this time, it is now up to you to defend your home and fend off the intruder for as long as you can. Question is, how long can you last in this "Home Alone Da Mountains"?

Created by Brooklyn Nets

Members:

Emerson Celestial

Drei Gaurana
